mapper.sql: id, pts.company_cd, file_name, pts.create_time, pts.authorcd,start_day, case valid_flg when 0 then null else pts.shelf_pattern_cd end as shelf_pattern_cd
mapper.select:
select distinct
from planocycle.shelf_pts_data pts left join planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst pattern on pts.shelf_pattern_cd = pattern.shelf_pattern_cd and pts.company_cd = pattern.company_cd left join planocycle.shelf_pattern_area area on pts.shelf_pattern_cd = area.shelf_pattern_cd and pattern.company_cd = area.company_cd where pts.company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pts.deleteflg=0
and (pts.valid_flg =0 or pts.valid_flg is null)
and area.areacd in
#{item}
and pts.valid_flg =1
order by id desc
mapper.update: update planocycle.shelf_pts_data set valid_flg =0 where company_cd = #{conpanyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.select: SELECT pattern_cd as patternCd,p.shelf_pattern_name as patternName, pts_cd as ptsCd,pts_cd ||'_'|| d.file_name as ptsName, h.start_day as startDay,authorcd,d.create_time as createTime FROM planocycle.shelf_pts_data_history h left join planocycle.shelf_pts_data d on h.pts_cd = d.id left join planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst p on h.pattern_cd = p.shelf_pattern_cd where h.company_cd=#{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by pattern_cd,startDay desc
select id,id||'_'||file_name as fileName from planocycle.shelf_pts_data where company_cd=#{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and deleteflg=0 order by id desc

select distinct pattern.shelf_pattern_cd as id,pattern.shelf_pattern_name as fileName, id as shelfPatternCd, pts.create_time as createTime, pts.authorcd,start_day as startDay from planocycle.shelf_pattern_mst pattern left join planocycle.shelf_pts_data pts on pattern.shelf_pattern_cd = pts.shelf_pattern_cd and pts.company_cd = pattern.company_cd left join planocycle.shelf_pattern_area area on pattern.shelf_pattern_cd = area.shelf_pattern_cd and pattern.company_cd = area.company_cd where pattern.company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pattern.deleteflg=0
and not exists (select shelf_pattern_cd from planocycle.shelf_pts_data ptss where pattern.shelf_pattern_cd = ptss.shelf_pattern_cd)
and area.areacd in
#{item}
order by id desc

foreach.if: update planocycle.shelf_pts_data set shelf_pattern_cd = null ,start_day = to_date(#{list.startDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-MM-dd') ,valid_flg = 0 where shelf_pattern_cd = #{list.shelfPatternCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
